class.name: CSGSculptedPrimitive3D
class.brief_description: Base class for sculpted primitives with advanced sculpting parameters.
class.description: CSGSculptedPrimitive3D is the base class for sculpted primitives that extend Godot's CSG system with advanced sculpting parameters. These primitives support profile cuts, path cuts, hollow, taper, twist, shear, and revolutions - allowing for complex parametric shape generation. This class provides the common parameters shared by all sculpted primitives.

members.member: The hollow amount (0.0 to 1.0). Creates a hollow interior.

The shape of the hollow interior. [constant HOLLOW_SAME] matches the profile shape, [constant HOLLOW_CIRCLE] uses a circle, [constant HOLLOW_SQUARE] uses a square, [constant HOLLOW_TRIANGLE] uses a triangle.
The material to use for the CSG shape.
Path begin cut (0.0 to 1.0). Cuts away the beginning of the path.
The path curve type. Determines how the profile is swept along the path: [constant PATH_CURVE_LINE] for straight paths, [constant PATH_CURVE_CIRCLE] for circular paths, etc.
Path end cut (0.0 to 1.0). Cuts away the end of the path.
Profile begin cut (0.0 to 1.0). Cuts away the beginning of the profile.

The profile curve type. Determines the cross-sectional shape: [constant PROFILE_CURVE_CIRCLE] for circular, [constant PROFILE_CURVE_SQUARE] for square, [constant PROFILE_CURVE_ISOTRI] for isosceles triangle, etc.
Profile end cut (0.0 to 1.0). Cuts away the end of the profile.
Scale vector (x, y) for the profile. Scales the profile shape along the X and Y axes before applying other transformations.
Radius offset value. Adds or subtracts from the profile radius, allowing the shape to expand or contract.
Number of revolutions for circular paths (0.1 to 4.0).
Shear vector (x, y) which offsets the profile along the path. X offsets along the X axis, Y offsets along the Y axis as the path progresses.
Skew amount. Offsets the shape along the Z axis as it progresses along the path, creating a skewed effect.

Taper vector (x, y). X is taper at path begin, Y is taper at path end (-1.0 to 1.0). Positive values make the shape wider, negative values make it narrower. The taper interpolates smoothly from begin to end.
Twist amount at the beginning of the path (-1.0 to 1.0).
Twist amount at the end of the path (-1.0 to 1.0). The twist interpolates between begin and end.

constants.constant: Hollow shape matches the profile shape.
